mapper.sql: tb.contract_id as contractId, tb.member_id as memberId, tb.worth_price as worthPrice, tb.no_pl as noPl, tb.position_price as positionPrice, tb.used_price as usedPrice, tb.entrust_price as entrustPrice, tb.give_price as givePrice, tb.rate as rate, tb.type as type, tb.version as version, tb.status as status, tb.del as del, tb.remark as remark, tb.CREATE_TIME as createTime, tb.CREATE_USER as createUser, tb.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, tb.UPDATE_USER as updateUser
mapper.select:
select
from fin_futures tb inner join app_member am on tb.member_id = am.member_id where tb.del='N'
and tb.member_id =(select member_id from app_member where account=#{condition})
and (am.member_id = #{memberId} or am.parent_referee_id like concat('%',#{recommendIds}))
and tb.used_price >= #{minPrice}
and tb.used_price <= #{maxPrice}
order by tb.update_time desc
mapper.update: update fin_futures set version=#{version}+1, used_price=#{usedPrice}, position_price=#{positionPrice}, entrust_price=#{entrustPrice}, give_price=#{givePrice}, no_pl=#{noPl}, worth_price=#{worthPrice}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser} where member_id=#{memberId} and version=#{version}
mapper.select: select count(1) from e_compact where member_id=#{memberId} and coin=#{coin} and status='N' and del='N'
